text: Alphabet is an American company based in California. It holds Google and 12 other projects. The CEO is Sundar Pichai. == History == Alphabet was founded as a Google parent holding company on August 10, 2015. It included 9 businesses. On December 3, 2019, the Google CEO Sundar Pichai became the Alphabet CEO too. That year the company was ranked #15 on the Fortune 500 list of global US corporations by revenue. In 2020, Alphabet net income was $40,269 million. On January 16, 2020, Alphabet reached a $1 trillion market value. == Critics == In October 2020, the United States Government Department of Justice filed an Anti-Trust Lawsuit against Alphabet Inc over Googleâ€™s monopoly on Search. ==References == Category:2015 establishments in California Category:Companies based in the San Francisco Bay Area Category:Companies listed on NASDAQ Category:Google Category:Mountain View, California
title: Alphabet Inc.
